newsitem.title: EU: EP LEGAL AFFAIRS COMMITTEE AGENDA - OCT 28-30.
newsitem.headline: EP LEGAL AFFAIRS COMMITTEE AGENDA - OCT 28-30.

Date of next meeting (PE/VII/OJ/19-96 ) 27.1 Deadline for texts for translation before the next meeting (reminder) - Wednesday, 30 October 1996 A N N E X I ===] APPOINTMENT of RAPPORTEUR on - 1. Protocol on Privileges and Immunities and procedure for applying tax (amendm ent of Regs 549/69 and 260/68) (T04973) (96/105) (T04973) CNS96214 COM(96)0400 C4-0534/96 + JURI Fond - Rapporteur - Group - Points - 1.1 * * * ===] APPOINTMENT of DRAFTSMAN on - 2. Sale of consumer goods and associated guarantees (proposal for a directive) (T04955) (96/100) (T04955) COD96161 COM(95)0520 C4-0455/96 + JURI Avis F ENVI Fond R KUHN Annemarie. Protection against effects of application of certain third-country legislati on (Helms-Burton Act) (T04951) (96/116) (T04951) CNS96217 COM(96)0420 C4-0519/96 + JURI Avis F RELA Fond R KITTELMANN Peter. (PPE) (PE218.828/DEF) - Draftsman - Group - Points -. following a request for urgent procedure in October, the REX committee expe cts to adopt its draft report on - 22 October 1996 in Strasbourg - part-session NOVEMBER I 1996 - the 'HUGHES' procedure will be proposed A N N E X II ===] Rule 45 motion referred to the committee as the committee responsible at th e part-session of 16-20 September - Decision on procedure (Rule 45(2)) - attach the motion to other motions or reports - or deliver an opinion, possibly in the form of a letter - or decide to draw up a report, for which authorization will have to be obtaine d from the Conference of Presidents 20. Establishing a European Mediation and Arbitration Tribunal (B4-0709/96) ( (96/104) ) - Rapporteur - Group - Points - END OF DOCUMENT.
